lead_paragraph: Connecticut Coach Jim Calhoun is being treated for a second bout of skin cancer but expects to be on the bench this fall for his 23rd season with the Huskies. Calhoun, 66, said doctors determined last month that a lump in the upper right side of his neck near the jaw line was squamous cell cancer, a type of skin cancer. He had an operation May 6 to remove the lump, several dozen surrounding lymph nodes and part of his salivary gland.
